meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with edible bulbs.
meanings.sent1: The camass grew tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I harvested some camass bulbs for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the camass plant bring a shovel to the party? To dig up some fun!
meanings.sent4: The field of camass flowers was a blue sea under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of camass filled the air as we walked through the meadow.

meanings.definition: The edible bulb of the camass plant.
meanings.sent1: She cooked a delicious stew with camass bulbs.
meanings.sent2: The camass bulb was a staple food for the tribe.
meanings.sent3: The camass bulb rolled off the table and started a race with the potatoes.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like camass bulbs in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The camass bulb was as round and plump as a tiny potato.

meanings.definition: A blue-flowered plant native to western North America.
meanings.sent1: The camass added a splash of color to the meadow.
meanings.sent2: We admired the delicate petals of the camass flowers.
meanings.sent3: The camass plant told the other flowers a corny joke and they all laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as blue as a field of camass in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The camass flowers danced in the breeze, a blue symphony in the sunlight.
